actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: Resolution designating the majority party's membership on the standing committees and the Select Committee on Small Business of the Senate for the Ninety-fourth Congress.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of the majority party's membership on the standing committees and the Select Committee on Small Business of the Senate for the Ninety-fourth Congress.

titles.title: Resolution designating the majority party's membership on the standing committees and the Select Committee on Small Business of the Senate for the Ninety-fourth Congress.
